inputs.name: bids_dir
inputs.description: the root folder of a BIDS valid dataset (sub-XXXXX folders should be found at the top level in this folder).

inputs.name: output_dir
inputs.description: the output path for the outcomes of preprocessing and visual reports

inputs.name: analysis_level
inputs.description: processing stage to be run, only "participant" in the case of qsiprep (see BIDS-Apps specification).

inputs.name: version
inputs.description: show program's version number and exit

inputs.name: skip_bids_validation
inputs.description: assume the input dataset is BIDS compliant and skip the validation

inputs.name: participant_label
inputs.description: a space delimited list of participant identifiers or a single identifier (the sub- prefix can be removed)

inputs.name: bids_database_dir
inputs.description: path to a saved BIDS database directory

inputs.name: bids_filters
inputs.description: a JSON file describing custom BIDS input filters using PyBIDS. For further details, please check out https://fmriprep.readthedocs.io/en/latest/faq.html#how-do-I-select-only-certain-files-to-be-input-to-fMRIPrep

inputs.name: interactive_reports_only
inputs.description: create interactive report json files on already preprocessed data.

inputs.name: recon_only
inputs.description: run only reconstruction, assumes preprocessing has already completed.

inputs.name: recon_spec
inputs.description: json file specifying a reconstruction pipeline to be run after preprocessing

inputs.name: recon_input
inputs.description: use this directory as inputs to qsirecon. This option skips qsiprep.

inputs.name: recon_input_pipeline
inputs.description: specify which pipeline was used to create the data specified as the --recon-input. Not necessary to specify if the data was processed by qsiprep. Other options include "ukb" for data processed with the UK BioBank minimal preprocessing pipeline and "hcpya" for the HCP young adult minimal preprocessing pipeline.

inputs.name: freesurfer_input
inputs.description: Directory containing freesurfer outputs to be integrated into recon.

inputs.name: skip_odf_reports
inputs.description: run only reconstruction, assumes preprocessing has already completed.

inputs.name: nthreads
inputs.description: maximum number of threads across all processes

inputs.name: omp_nthreads
inputs.description: maximum number of threads per-process

inputs.name: mem_mb
inputs.description: upper bound memory limit for qsiprep processes

inputs.name: low_mem
inputs.description: attempt to reduce memory usage (will increase disk usage in working directory)

inputs.name: use_plugin
inputs.description: nipype plugin configuration file

inputs.name: anat_only
inputs.description: run anatomical workflows only

inputs.name: dwi_only
inputs.description: ignore anatomical (T1w/T2w) data and process DWIs only

inputs.name: infant
inputs.description: configure pipelines to process infant brains

inputs.name: boilerplate
inputs.description: generate boilerplate only

inputs.name: verbose_count
inputs.description: increases log verbosity for each occurrence, debug level is -vvv

inputs.name: anat_modality
inputs.description: Modality to use as the anatomical reference. Images of this contrast will be skull stripped and segmented for use in the visual reports and reconstruction. If --infant, T2w is forced.

inputs.name: ignore
inputs.description: ignore selected aspects of the input dataset to disable corresponding parts of the workflow (a space delimited list). Ignoring "phase" will disable complex-valued denoising, when phase DWI data are available.

inputs.name: longitudinal
inputs.description: treat dataset as longitudinal - may increase runtime

inputs.name: b0_threshold
inputs.description: any value in the .bval file less than this will be considered a b=0 image. Current default threshold = 100; this threshold can be lowered or increased. Note, setting this too high can result in inaccurate results.

inputs.name: dwi_denoise_window
inputs.description: window size in voxels for image-based denoising, integer or "auto".If "auto", 5 will be used for dwidenoise and auto-configured for patch2self based on the number of b>0 images.

inputs.name: denoise_method
inputs.description: Image-based denoising method. Either "dwidenoise" (MRtrix), "patch2self" (DIPY) or none. (default: dwidenoise)

inputs.name: unringing_method
inputs.description:
Method for Gibbs-ringing removal.
 - none: no action
 - mrdegibbs: use mrdegibbs from mrtrix3
 - rpg: Gibbs from TORTOISE, suggested for partial Fourier acquisitions (default: none).

inputs.name: dwi_no_biascorr
inputs.description: DEPRECATED: see --b1-biascorr-stage

inputs.name: b1_biascorrect_stage
inputs.description: Which stage to apply B1 bias correction. The default 'final' will apply it after all the data has been resampled to its final space. 'none' will skip B1 bias correction and 'legacy' will behave consistent with qsiprep < 0.17.

inputs.name: no_b0_harmonization
inputs.description: skip re-scaling dwi scans to have matching b=0 intensities

inputs.name: denoise_after_combining
inputs.description: run ``dwidenoise`` after combining dwis, but before motion correction. Requires ``--combine-all-dwis``

inputs.name: separate_all_dwis
inputs.description: don't attempt to combine dwis from multiple runs. Each will be processed separately.

inputs.name: distortion_group_merge
inputs.description:
How to combine images across distorted groups.
 - concatenate: append images in the 4th dimension
  - average: if a whole sequence was duplicated in both PE
            directions, average the corrected images of the same
            q-space coordinate
 - none: Default. Keep distorted groups separate

inputs.name: write_local_bvecs
inputs.description: write a series of voxelwise bvecs, relevant if writing preprocessed dwis to template space

inputs.name: anatomical_template
inputs.description: volume template space (default: MNI152NLin2009cAsym)

inputs.name: output_resolution
inputs.description: the isotropic voxel size in mm the data will be resampled to after preprocessing. If set to a lower value than the original voxel size, your data will be upsampled using BSpline interpolation.

inputs.name: b0_to_t1w_transform
inputs.description: Degrees of freedom when registering b0 to anatomical images. 6 degrees (rotation and translation) are used by default.

inputs.name: intramodal_template_iters
inputs.description: Number of iterations for finding the midpoint image from the b0 templates from all groups. Has no effect if there is only one group. If 0, all b0 templates are directly registered to the t1w image.

inputs.name: intramodal_template_transform
inputs.description: Transformation used for building the intramodal template.

inputs.name: b0_motion_corr_to
inputs.description: align to the "first" b0 volume or do an "iterative" registration of all b0 images to their midpoint image (default: iterative)

inputs.name: hmc_transform
inputs.description: transformation to be optimized during head motion correction (default: affine)

inputs.name: hmc_model
inputs.description: model used to generate target images for hmc. If "none" the non-b0 images will be warped using the same transform as their nearest b0 image. If "3dSHORE", SHORELine will be used. if "tensor", SHORELine iterations with a tensor model will be used

inputs.name: eddy_config
inputs.description: path to a json file with settings for the call to eddy. If no json is specified, a default one will be used. The current default json can be found here: https://github.com/PennBBL/qsiprep/blob/master/qsiprep/data/eddy_params.json

inputs.name: shoreline_iters
inputs.description: number of SHORELine iterations. (default: 2)

inputs.name: impute_slice_threshold
inputs.description: impute data in slices that are this many SDs from expected. If 0 (default), no slices will be imputed

inputs.name: skull_strip_template
inputs.description: select ANTs skull-stripping template (default: OASIS). (IGNORED)

inputs.name: skull_strip_fixed_seed
inputs.description: do not use a random seed for skull-stripping - will ensure run-to-run replicability when used with --omp-nthreads 1. (IGNORED)

inputs.name: skip_anat_based_spatial_normalization
inputs.description: skip running the t1w-based normalization to template space. Default is to run the normalization.

inputs.name: fs_license_file
inputs.description: Path to FreeSurfer license key file. Get it (for free) by registering at https://surfer.nmr.mgh.harvard.edu/registration.html

inputs.name: do_reconall
inputs.description: Run the FreeSurfer recon-all pipeline (IGNORED)

inputs.name: pepolar_method
inputs.description: select which SDC method to use for PEPOLAR fieldmaps (default: TOPUP)

inputs.name: denoised_image_sdc
inputs.description: use denoised b=0 images if available instead of raw (from BIDS) images in SDC

inputs.name: prefer_dedicated_fmaps
inputs.description: forces unwarping to use files from the fmap directory instead of using an RPEdir scan from the same session. (IGNORED)

inputs.name: fmap_bspline
inputs.description: fit a B-Spline field using least-squares (experimental)

inputs.name: fmap_no_demean
inputs.description: do not remove median (within mask) from fieldmap (default: True)

inputs.name: use_syn_sdc
inputs.description: EXPERIMENTAL: Use fieldmap-free distortion correction. To use this option, "template" must be passed to --output-space. (IGNORED)

inputs.name: force_syn
inputs.description: EXPERIMENTAL/TEMPORARY: Use SyN correction in addition to fieldmap correction, if available

inputs.name: work_dir
inputs.description: path where intermediate results should be stored

inputs.name: resource_monitor
inputs.description: enable Nipype's resource monitoring to keep track of memory and CPU usage

inputs.name: reports_only
inputs.description: only generate reports, don't run workflows. This will only rerun report aggregation, not reportlet generation for specific nodes.

inputs.name: run_uuid
inputs.description: Specify UUID of previous run, to include error logs in report. No effect without --reports-only.

inputs.name: write_graph
inputs.description: Write workflow graph.

inputs.name: stop_on_first_crash
inputs.description: Force stopping on first crash, even if a work directory was specified.

inputs.name: notrack
inputs.description: Opt-out of sending tracking information of this run to the qsiprep developers. This information helps to improve qsiprep and provides an indicator of real world usage crucial for obtaining funding.

inputs.name: sloppy
inputs.description: Use low-quality tools for speed - TESTING ONLY
